message:
SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 9
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
9
NLP systems including
multilinguality: EWN
¾ EuroWordNet
•
Based in Wordnet, http://wordnet.princeton.edu/perl/webwn
¾ Objectives
•
Building a multilingual database with wordnets for several languages:
Dutch, Italian, Spanish,  English, German, French, Estonian and Czeck
•
Building wordnets: monolingual autonomous ontologies, connected by 
an ILI
•
Based on Wordnet synsets: set of synonymous word meanings and
basic semantic relations
•
Using existing national resources to build networks independently
•
Maintain the language specific structures and compare concept
relations
¾ Participants: 8 universities (UNED, UPC), 3 Business firms.
¾ Funded by the EU.
speaker: SYSTEM
